content: the simple fair isle hat was my very first fair isle project which i decided to write up into a pattern it´s a very lovely hat with a simple design it is a quick project worked in bulky yarn using 5 5mm needles skill level easy but not a beginner pattern this pattern doesn´t teach you how to knit materials 2 balls of 100% merino yarn 1 dyed 1 undyed 1 skein is 100m/109y if you won´t be making a pompom you don´t need as much yarn 60cm 24inch circular needles size 5 5mm us 9 scissors darning needle if you have any feedback i would be very grateful if you reach out to me either here or through my instagram
